post.Content:

Central bank of Russia wants to ban crypto

The central bank of Russia has proposed a complete ban of cryptocurrencies. If this proposal becomes a law, anything connected to trading, mining and usage of cryptocurrencies would be considered illegal. Russia can thus follow a pretty similar path as was seen with China last year.

post.Title: Intel with a $20 billion investment | Investro.com
post.Content:
Your current market movers

Intel with a $20 billion investment

Intel Corporation has announced today that it will invest 20 billion dollars in semiconductor factories. More concretely, Intel is aiming to construct 2 plants in Ohio, with the construction set to start by the end of 2022. It is expected that the factories should be ready by the end of 2025 and should help with semiconductor manufacturing in US.

post.Title: Inflation in EU to fall to 3.2% by December? | Investro.com
post.Content:
Your current market movers

Inflation in EU to fall to 3.2% by December?

Philip Lane, European Central Bank (ECB) Chief Economist, specified today that inflation is expected to fall by the end of the year. He believes that in the coming months inflation can remain rather high, but expects it to fall to 3.2 % by end of the year. ECB does not plan interest rate hikes, but that can change if inflation remains high.
